items.sentence: Tom didn't seem to want to tell me about what he'd done.
Let me give you the reasons why I don't want to do that.
Anyone interested in volunteering should give me a call.
No matter how much you want to do that, I can't let you.
Up until the time Tom arrived, everybody was having fun.
Tom's trial was to start today, but it's been postponed.
According to the news, there will be a typhoon tomorrow.
Tom pretended to understand what the old man was saying.
I need to know ahead of time so that we can be prepared.
Tom sells vegetables in his stall at the farmers market.
Tom went back to studying as soon as Mary left the room.
You're the one who talked to Tom about that, aren't you?
Maybe now is not a good time to buy waterfront property.
I'm thinking of going back to Boston for a little while.
Everything that Tom predicted would happen has happened.
It was not until a few days later that the news arrived.
Ice cream sells better in the summer than in the winter.
We need to go to the drugstore to buy Tom some medicine.
The last time Tom tried to hug Mary, she got mad at him.
There were only three presents under the Christmas tree.
